formalText: She's finding herself really emotionally exhausted.
She just wants to avoid dealing with herself.

She thinks what she wants is some relief, she just doesn't want to have to deal with it or think about difficult stuff. One of the things she hated about it was feeling like she doesn't want to do this again.
Also she just feels really ambushed and overwhelmed.

She really feels like she is making a series of fly-by-night decisions that aren't exactly decisions, but more like reactions. She's feeling so out of control and not able to  take care of herself, and it's hard.
She also finds it super stressful.
She thinks about all these things, but she's too tired. It's too much to think about or to continue pressing after.
She's frequently reluctant to say this about herself, but she has PTSD, and she finds it extremely difficult to say that she was in an abusive relationship.
